entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does AOT plan to support EMIT in the future #95841
  • HttpClient Support Data URLs (scheme data:) #95838
  • [API Proposal]: Enable configurable HostLifetime shutdown delay via HostOptions #95835

Closed

  • Exception when profiling with Instrumentation from Visual Studio #95839
  • `SocketsHttpHandler.ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector` may be ignored for Location headers #95799
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • use enclosing type cls handle for VN of static gc/non-gc helper #95840
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics thread to be walked by the GC #95837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Port loop alignment to new loop representation #95836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Move some runtime code to a separate runtime.h/runtime.c… #95834
    area-Build-mono
  • Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #95833
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.71, windows: 120.0.6099.71 #95832
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Respect ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector for the Location header #95810
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add Configurable Shutdown Delay to ConsoleLifetime #95828
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Merge more stores/loads #95823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: Surface failures for MT job when runtime has changes #95817
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `return` attribute target not suggested inside attribute list target syntax #71200
  • ForEachStatementInfo.ElementType lacks nullability #71199
  • Unable to open solution in MSbuild #71198

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I Just Wonder If net8.0 Blazor Webassembly Can Be Decompiled #52712
  • Calling .NET Method in JavaScript Initializer Causes Error: No call dispatcher has been set #52711
  • .NET 8 Blazor Error 404 after upgrading from .NET 6 #52710
  • Ability to add rendermode to blazor layouts #52709
  • Catch-all route at the root level doesn't work any more in .NET 8 #52708
  • [Blazor] [Authentication] RedirectToLogin from CookieHandler is not working behind a proxy #52707
  • Blazor 8 issue hot reload (AutoRender / Global) #52706
  • Blazor: Can `NavigateTo` and `href=` be used without interfering with each other? #52705
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #52704
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #52703
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52702
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52701
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52700
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52699
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52698
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52697
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52696
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #52695

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error DEP0700 on defualt MAUI template #19325
  • APT2000 - I can't create any new project #19324
  • ScrollView within ScrollView, outer partly stops working after scrolling inner #19323
  • TableView: ViewCell with Picker disappears when updated (on Android) #19321
  • "FragmentManager has been destroyed" upon changing orientation of phone, after app is closed, but after a foreground service has started #19320

PullRequests

Updated

  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    community ✨
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19316
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • SqliteDbContextOptionsBuilder.UseNetTopologySuite triggers Loader lock exception after several database reads #21806
    Backlog
  • `dotnet ef migration add` generates `DropTable()` calls for never used `ToTable()` calls #23167
  • Investigate why the .NET Portability Analyzer reports issues for EF Core #23722
  • Differnce in behavior between TPH and TPT/TPC with new entity added through navigation property #32084
    9.0.0
  • How to create a composite index with complex property ? #32578

Updated

  • Remove-Migration doesn't support Connection, but requires it #24271
    Backlog
  • "Could not load assembly 'Test'. Ensure it is referenced by the startup project 'Test'" error while adding migration for x86 .NET 5.0-preview7 project with dotnet ef 5.0-rc1 #22594
  • Migrations bug when creating stored procedure with GOTO statement #32457
  • Constructor not found for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer #32411
    8.0.x
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support ATTACH-ed databases #23587
    Backlog
  • Check commands[i] is not null for avoid NPE on Dispose command #22921
    9.0.0
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation regresses performance #32394
  • Linq Code no longer working since upgrading to .Net 8.0. Same query works fine in 7.0 #32532

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Ensure connection and commands can be disposed in either order #32581
  • Stop re-using the same connection when running test queries in parallel #32580
  • Revert the nongeneric DbContextOptions registration #32579

Merged

  • Don't consider a generated value stable just because it was explicitly set #32497
